title: 【2017年7月8日更新】【1.12function作品】传送与测距(TpAndDistance)
author: 林扬骐
txt_content:
本帖最后由 林扬骐 于 2017-7-9 17:55 编辑 

具体的在文件中已经很详细了（下面“pcb文档”展开），帖子里暂时就挑重点的说，原理也在之后另一个帖子具体说（不过简单说就是稍改进后的二分法加上一些别的东西（实际上调试与改进很费时的XD！））


(以前的二分法原理图（现在此贴的方法是正负分两个function防止“传送不回来”）：)


（下面_mover为带tag:distance_mover的实体的简写）


更新日志：（注：更新的部分暂时只在更新日志中讲述，原帖基本不更改）


(2017.7.8)添加新的函数并修改了一些之前的函数及说明
新函数：
(1)distance_o_x/y/z/all：测量带tag:distance_o的实体tp到@s的相对坐标值(@s、_o的坐标都不会改变）
(2)distance_error：表示执行错误 (在没有所需实体的状况下就执行distance系列函数时会自动执行)（所以distance系列函数都有更改）
(3)prompt：给出一些相关命令的快捷输入 (error中的tellraw会给出此函数的“链接”)(按住shift点击带有下划线的文字即可输入输入栏)
(4)print：给@a[r=100,tag=print_receiver]输出@s的tp/distance分数并判断其是否带有tag:distance_o/distance_mover



功能简述：

通过function文件，可以做到：
1.让执行者（@s）按照指定的分数传送一段距离（相对坐标）；
2.测量执行者tp到另一个点的相对坐标值，并让“另一个点”被测轴坐标的值同化于执行者，分数存于“另一个点”；
3.上两者的更灵活与简便的过程操作（很多function细分（功能的丰富、细分让我想起当年的迷宫机））。

用法：






初始化（设立计分板）：
function linyangqi-tpanddistance:init
移除计分板（可与init配合以重置）：
function linyangqi-tpanddistance:remove
使执行者按照自己的tp_x/y/z分数移动，后分数归零（分数范围：-511~511）：
function linyangqi-tpanddistance:tp_x
function linyangqi-tpanddistance:tp_y
function linyangqi-tpanddistance:tp_z
function linyangqi-tpanddistance:tp_all
使distance_x/y/z/三者同时 分数重置（正常使用distance前需要如此分数重置）：
function linyangqi-tpanddistance:distance_reset_x
function linyangqi-tpanddistance:distance_reset_y
function linyangqi-tpanddistance:distance_reset_z
function linyangqi-tpanddistance:distance_reset_all
测量执行者（@s）tp到 带tag：distance_mover的实体的位置 需要的x/y/z/三轴 的相对坐标（分数储存于"_mover"实体的三个distance计分板）
function linyangqi-tpanddistance:distance_all
function linyangqi-tpanddistance:distance_x
function linyangqi-tpanddistance:distance_y
function linyangqi-tpanddistance:distance_z

复制代码


基础设置说明（计分板与tag）：

计分板 x 9：
tp_x : x轴上的tp
tp_y : y轴上的tp
tp_z : z轴上的tp
tpplan_x : x轴上tp的暂存（程序自身不会用上）
tpplan_y : y轴上tp的暂存
tpplan_z : z轴上tp的暂存
distance_x : x轴上的distance
distance_y : y轴上的distance
distance_z : z轴上的distance

tag x 1（手动设置的）:
distance_mover : distance中的被测实体（具体查看文件distance_all（下面“pcb文档”展开））
（下面_mover为带tag:distance_mover的实体的简写）

注意/提示：

1.可以用记事本打开mcfunction文件，但是一定不要保存！！！（就算没有更改）
2.用distance系列时，_mover实体碰撞箱过大可能无法保证距离正确（如测量执行者到盔甲架的y轴相对坐标，而盔甲架高约2格）
3.tag：distance_mover不会自动清除
4.用distance测量前请手动对_mover测量坐标轴分数清零（可以用函数distance_reset_x/y/z/all）,否则会有另一种效果（此效果好像_mover测量前的位置始终不变）
5.用distance测量，执行者位置不变，而_mover的被测轴坐标的值会同化于命令执行者(例：测量执行者到_mover的y轴相对坐标，最终_mover的y轴坐标同化于执行者，而两者的x、z轴的坐标都不会变)

pcb文档

基础说明（如分数设置等）都会在init.mcfunction中（或是init加了别的名称后缀的mcfunction文件）

new func init
#释义：tp(teleport)：传送；distance：距离
#会设立一共9个计分板目标，分别是：
#tp_x tp_y tp_z tpplan_x tpplan_y tpplan_z （详细用处参见tp_all.mcfunction）
#distance_x distance_y distance_z （详细用处参见distance_all.mcfunction）
#同时distance还会用上1个手动设置的tag：distance_mover （详细用处参见distance_all.mcfunction）
#"_mover"是简写，表示带distance_mover的tag的实体
#
#设置分数：scoreboard players set @s tp_x 233
scoreboard objectives add tp_x dummy x轴上的tp
scoreboard objectives add tp_y dummy y轴上的tp
scoreboard objectives add tp_z dummy z轴上的tp
scoreboard objectives add tpplan_x dummy x轴上tp的暂存
scoreboard objectives add tpplan_y dummy y轴上tp的暂存
scoreboard objectives add tpplan_z dummy z轴上tp的暂存
scoreboard objectives add distance_x dummy x轴上的distance
scoreboard objectives add distance_y dummy y轴上的distance
scoreboard objectives add distance_z dummy z轴上的distance
new func remove
#只是去除计分板，可以与init配合以重置所有计分板（不含tag清除）
scoreboard objectives remove tp_x
scoreboard objectives remove tp_y
scoreboard objectives remove tp_z
scoreboard objectives remove tpplan_x
scoreboard objectives remove tpplan_y
scoreboard objectives remove tpplan_z
scoreboard objectives remove distance_x
scoreboard objectives remove distance_y
scoreboard objectives remove distance_z
new func tp_all
#注：此function会用@s选择器
#
#功能：让实体 按照输入的分数，在对应轴上tp相应的“相对坐标量”（如：某实体tp_x分数为100，执行该函数会让该实体x轴坐标值+100）
#（先tp后改分数，选择器条件为分数）tp后对应轴分数会减去tp的值（正常范围内分数会最终归零）
#正常分数范围：-511~511（可以更改，只要明白原理并举一反三）
#_all只是简化的3轴同时调用，3个function可以分开用
function linyangqi-tpanddistance:tp_x- if @s[score_tp_x=-1]
function linyangqi-tpanddistance:tp_x+ if @s[score_tp_x_min=1]
function linyangqi-tpanddistance:tp_y- if @s[score_tp_y=-1]
function linyangqi-tpanddistance:tp_y+ if @s[score_tp_y_min=1]
function linyangqi-tpanddistance:tp_z- if @s[score_tp_z=-1]
function linyangqi-tpanddistance:tp_z+ if @s[score_tp_z_min=1]
new func tp_x
function linyangqi-tpanddistance:tp_x- if @s[score_tp_x=-1]
function linyangqi-tpanddistance:tp_x+ if @s[score_tp_x_min=1]
new func tp_y
function linyangqi-tpanddistance:tp_y- if @s[score_tp_y=-1]
function linyangqi-tpanddistance:tp_y+ if @s[score_tp_y_min=1]
new func tp_z
function linyangqi-tpanddistance:tp_z- if @s[score_tp_z=-1]
function linyangqi-tpanddistance:tp_z+ if @s[score_tp_z_min=1]
new func tp_x+

tp @s[score_tp_x=511,score_tp_x_min=256] ~256 ~ ~
scoreboard players remove @s[score_tp_x=511,score_tp_x_min=256] tp_x 256
tp @s[score_tp_x=255,score_tp_x_min=128] ~128 ~ ~
scoreboard players remove @s[score_tp_x=255,score_tp_x_min=128] tp_x 128

tp @s[score_tp_x=127,score_tp_x_min=64] ~64 ~ ~
scoreboard players remove @s[score_tp_x=127,score_tp_x_min=64] tp_x 64

tp @s[score_tp_x=63,score_tp_x_min=32] ~32 ~ ~
scoreboard players remove @s[score_tp_x=63,score_tp_x_min=32] tp_x 32

tp @s[score_tp_x=31,score_tp_x_min=16] ~16 ~ ~
scoreboard players remove @s[score_tp_x=31,score_tp_x_min=16] tp_x 16

tp @s[score_tp_x=15,score_tp_x_min=8] ~8 ~ ~
scoreboard players remove @s[score_tp_x=15,score_tp_x_min=8] tp_x 8

tp @s[score_tp_x=7,score_tp_x_min=4] ~4 ~ ~
scoreboard players remove @s[score_tp_x=7,score_tp_x_min=4] tp_x 4

tp @s[score_tp_x=3,score_tp_x_min=2] ~2 ~ ~
scoreboard players remove @s[score_tp_x=3,score_tp_x_min=2] tp_x 2

tp @s[score_tp_x=1,score_tp_x_min=1] ~1 ~ ~
scoreboard players remove @s[score_tp_x=1,score_tp_x_min=1] tp_x 1

new func tp_y+
//tp例子、穷举格式{

/*
tp @s[score_tp_y=-1,score_tp_y_min=-512] ~ ~-512 ~
scoreboard players add @s[score_tp_y=-1,score_tp_y_min=-512] tp_y 512

for 1 to 9
#a=2^(10-#i)-1
#b=2^(9-#i)
print:tp @s[score_tp_z=#a,score_tp_z_min=#b] ~ ~ ~#b
print:scoreboard players remove @s[score_tp_z=#a,score_tp_z_min=#b] tp_z #b

*/
//}
tp @s[score_tp_y=511,score_tp_y_min=256] ~ ~256 ~
scoreboard players remove @s[score_tp_y=511,score_tp_y_min=256] tp_y 256
tp @s[score_tp_y=255,score_tp_y_min=128] ~ ~128 ~
scoreboard players remove @s[score_tp_y=255,score_tp_y_min=128] tp_y 128
tp @s[score_tp_y=127,score_tp_y_min=64] ~ ~64 ~
scoreboard players remove @s[score_tp_y=127,score_tp_y_min=64] tp_y 64
tp @s[score_tp_y=63,score_tp_y_min=32] ~ ~32 ~
scoreboard players remove @s[score_tp_y=63,score_tp_y_min=32] tp_y 32
tp @s[score_tp_y=31,score_tp_y_min=16] ~ ~16 ~
scoreboard players remove @s[score_tp_y=31,score_tp_y_min=16] tp_y 16
tp @s[score_tp_y=15,score_tp_y_min=8] ~ ~8 ~
scoreboard players remove @s[score_tp_y=15,score_tp_y_min=8] tp_y 8
tp @s[score_tp_y=7,score_tp_y_min=4] ~ ~4 ~
scoreboard players remove @s[score_tp_y=7,score_tp_y_min=4] tp_y 4
tp @s[score_tp_y=3,score_tp_y_min=2] ~ ~2 ~
scoreboard players remove @s[score_tp_y=3,score_tp_y_min=2] tp_y 2
tp @s[score_tp_y=1,score_tp_y_min=1] ~ ~1 ~
scoreboard players remove @s[score_tp_y=1,score_tp_y_min=1] tp_y 1
new func tp_z+
tp @s[score_tp_z=511,score_tp_z_min=256] ~ ~ ~256
scoreboard players remove @s[score_tp_z=511,score_tp_z_min=256] tp_z 256
tp @s[score_tp_z=255,score_tp_z_min=128] ~ ~ ~128
scoreboard players remove @s[score_tp_z=255,score_tp_z_min=128] tp_z 128
tp @s[score_tp_z=127,score_tp_z_min=64] ~ ~ ~64
scoreboard players remove @s[score_tp_z=127,score_tp_z_min=64] tp_z 64
tp @s[score_tp_z=63,score_tp_z_min=32] ~ ~ ~32
scoreboard players remove @s[score_tp_z=63,score_tp_z_min=32] tp_z 32
tp @s[score_tp_z=31,score_tp_z_min=16] ~ ~ ~16
scoreboard players remove @s[score_tp_z=31,score_tp_z_min=16] tp_z 16
tp @s[score_tp_z=15,score_tp_z_min=8] ~ ~ ~8
scoreboard players remove @s[score_tp_z=15,score_tp_z_min=8] tp_z 8
tp @s[score_tp_z=7,score_tp_z_min=4] ~ ~ ~4
scoreboard players remove @s[score_tp_z=7,score_tp_z_min=4] tp_z 4
tp @s[score_tp_z=3,score_tp_z_min=2] ~ ~ ~2
scoreboard players remove @s[score_tp_z=3,score_tp_z_min=2] tp_z 2
tp @s[score_tp_z=1,score_tp_z_min=1] ~ ~ ~1
scoreboard players remove @s[score_tp_z=1,score_tp_z_min=1] tp_z 1

new func tp_x-

tp @s[score_tp_x_mn=-511,score_tp_x=-256] ~-256 ~ ~
scoreboard players add @s[score_tp_x_mn=-511,score_tp_x=-256] tp_x 256
tp @s[score_tp_x_mn=-255,score_tp_x=-128] ~-128 ~ ~
scoreboard players add @s[score_tp_x_mn=-255,score_tp_x=-128] tp_x 128
tp @s[score_tp_x_mn=-127,score_tp_x=-64] ~-64 ~ ~
scoreboard players add @s[score_tp_x_mn=-127,score_tp_x=-64] tp_x 64
tp @s[score_tp_x_mn=-63,score_tp_x=-32] ~-32 ~ ~
scoreboard players add @s[score_tp_x_mn=-63,score_tp_x=-32] tp_x 32
tp @s[score_tp_x_mn=-31,score_tp_x=-16] ~-16 ~ ~
scoreboard players add @s[score_tp_x_mn=-31,score_tp_x=-16] tp_x 16
tp @s[score_tp_x_mn=-15,score_tp_x=-8] ~-8 ~ ~
scoreboard players add @s[score_tp_x_mn=-15,score_tp_x=-8] tp_x 8
tp @s[score_tp_x_mn=-7,score_tp_x=-4] ~-4 ~ ~
scoreboard players add @s[score_tp_x_mn=-7,score_tp_x=-4] tp_x 4
tp @s[score_tp_x_mn=-3,score_tp_x=-2] ~-2 ~ ~
scoreboard players add @s[score_tp_x_mn=-3,score_tp_x=-2] tp_x 2
tp @s[score_tp_x_mn=-1,score_tp_x=-1] ~-1 ~ ~
scoreboard players add @s[score_tp_x_mn=-1,score_tp_x=-1] tp_x 1
new func tp_y-

tp @s[score_tp_y=511,score_tp_y_min=256] ~ ~-256 ~
scoreboard players add @s[score_tp_y=511,score_tp_y_min=256] tp_y 256
tp @s[score_tp_y=255,score_tp_y_min=128] ~ ~-128 ~
scoreboard players add @s[score_tp_y=255,score_tp_y_min=128] tp_y 128
tp @s[score_tp_y=127,score_tp_y_min=64] ~ ~-64 ~
scoreboard players add @s[score_tp_y=127,score_tp_y_min=64] tp_y 64
tp @s[score_tp_y=63,score_tp_y_min=32] ~ ~-32 ~
scoreboard players add @s[score_tp_y=63,score_tp_y_min=32] tp_y 32
tp @s[score_tp_y=31,score_tp_y_min=16] ~ ~-16 ~
scoreboard players add @s[score_tp_y=31,score_tp_y_min=16] tp_y 16
tp @s[score_tp_y=15,score_tp_y_min=8] ~ ~-8 ~
scoreboard players add @s[score_tp_y=15,score_tp_y_min=8] tp_y 8
tp @s[score_tp_y=7,score_tp_y_min=4] ~ ~-4 ~
scoreboard players add @s[score_tp_y=7,score_tp_y_min=4] tp_y 4
tp @s[score_tp_y=3,score_tp_y_min=2] ~ ~-2 ~
scoreboard players add @s[score_tp_y=3,score_tp_y_min=2] tp_y 2
tp @s[score_tp_y=1,score_tp_y_min=1] ~ ~-1 ~
scoreboard players add @s[score_tp_y=1,score_tp_y_min=1] tp_y 1
new func tp_z-
tp @s[score_tp_z=511,score_tp_z_min=256] ~ ~ ~-256
scoreboard players add @s[score_tp_z=511,score_tp_z_min=256] tp_z 256
tp @s[score_tp_z=255,score_tp_z_min=128] ~ ~ ~-128
scoreboard players add @s[score_tp_z=255,score_tp_z_min=128] tp_z 128
tp @s[score_tp_z=127,score_tp_z_min=64] ~ ~ ~-64
scoreboard players add @s[score_tp_z=127,score_tp_z_min=64] tp_z 64
tp @s[score_tp_z=63,score_tp_z_min=32] ~ ~ ~-32
scoreboard players add @s[score_tp_z=63,score_tp_z_min=32] tp_z 32
tp @s[score_tp_z=31,score_tp_z_min=16] ~ ~ ~-16
scoreboard players add @s[score_tp_z=31,score_tp_z_min=16] tp_z 16
tp @s[score_tp_z=15,score_tp_z_min=8] ~ ~ ~-8
scoreboard players add @s[score_tp_z=15,score_tp_z_min=8] tp_z 8
tp @s[score_tp_z=7,score_tp_z_min=4] ~ ~ ~-4
scoreboard players add @s[score_tp_z=7,score_tp_z_min=4] tp_z 4
tp @s[score_tp_z=3,score_tp_z_min=2] ~ ~ ~-2
scoreboard players add @s[score_tp_z=3,score_tp_z_min=2] tp_z 2
tp @s[score_tp_z=1,score_tp_z_min=1] ~ ~ ~-1
scoreboard players add @s[score_tp_z=1,score_tp_z_min=1] tp_z 1


new func distance_reset_all
scoreboard players reset @e[tag=distance_mover] distance_x
scoreboard players reset @e[tag=distance_mover] distance_y
scoreboard players reset @e[tag=distance_mover] distance_z
new func distance_reset_x
scoreboard players reset @e[tag=distance_mover] distance_x
new func distance_reset_y
scoreboard players reset @e[tag=distance_mover] distance_y
new func distance_reset_z
scoreboard players reset @e[tag=distance_mover] distance_z
new func distance_all
#注：此function会用@s选择器
#
#功能：计算执行命令者tp到“_mover”的位置需要的相对坐标（执行命令者只能一个，_mover可以多个）（执行者为“原点”）
#使用前，需手动让被测实体分别带上distance_mover的tag
#*tag不会自动清除
#*分数存于_mover实体上（有3个分数分别对应对应的坐标轴），分数为整数
#*注1：_mover实体碰撞箱过大可能无法保证距离正确
#*注2：为防止bug，测量前请手动对_mover测量坐标轴分数清零（可以用函数distance_reset_x/y/z/all）
#正常相对坐标范围内，_mover的被测坐标轴的值最终会等于命令执行者的对应坐标轴（例：执行者到_mover的 相对x坐标为233， 测量x轴距离后_o位置不变，_mover的x坐标变成与执行者相等，而y、z坐标二者都不变（命令：execute 某一命令执行者 ~ ~ ~ function linyangqi-tpanddistance:distance_x））
#（先改分数后tp，选择器条件为dx、dy、dz）
#正常相对坐标范围：-511~511（可以更改，只要明白原理并举一反三）
#_all只是简化的3轴同时调用，3个function可以分开用
#scoreboard players tag @e[r=5,c=1,type=!player] add distance_mover

function linyangqi-tpanddistance:distance_x+ if @e[c=1,r=1024,tag=distance_mover]
function linyangqi-tpanddistance:distance_x- if @e[c=1,r=1024,tag=distance_mover]
function linyangqi-tpanddistance:distance_y+ if @e[c=1,r=1024,tag=distance_mover]
function linyangqi-tpanddistance:distance_y- if @e[c=1,r=1024,tag=distance_mover]
function linyangqi-tpanddistance:distance_z+ if @e[c=1,r=1024,tag=distance_mover]
function linyangqi-tpanddistance:distance_z- if @e[c=1,r=1024,tag=distance_mover]
//{
/*
new func distance_x
execute @s ~ ~-512 ~-512 function linyangqi-tpanddistance:distance_x+ if @e[c=1,dx=511,dy=1023,dz=1023,tag=distance_mover]
execute @s ~ ~-512 ~-512 function linyangqi-tpanddistance:distance_x- if @e[c=1,dx=-511,dy=1023,dz=1023,tag=distance_mover]
new func distance_y
execute @s ~-512 ~ ~-512 function linyangqi-tpanddistance:distance_y+ if @e[c=1,dx=1023,dy=511,dz=1023,tag=distance_mover]
execute @s ~-512 ~ ~-512 function linyangqi-tpanddistance:distance_y- if @e[c=1,dx=1023,dy=-511,dz=1023,tag=distance_mover]
new func distance_z
execute @s ~-512 ~-512 ~ function linyangqi-tpanddistance:distance_z+ if @e[c=1,dx=1023,dy=1023,dz=511,tag=distance_mover]
execute @s ~-512 ~-512 ~ function linyangqi-tpanddistance:distance_z- if @e[c=1,dx=1023,dy=1023,dz=-511,tag=distance_mover]
*/
//}
new func distance_x
function linyangqi-tpanddistance:distance_x+ if @e[c=1,r=1024,tag=distance_mover]
function linyangqi-tpanddistance:distance_x- if @e[c=1,r=1024,tag=distance_mover]
new func distance_y
function linyangqi-tpanddistance:distance_y+ if @e[c=1,r=1024,tag=distance_mover]
function linyangqi-tpanddistance:distance_y- if @e[c=1,r=1024,tag=distance_mover]
new func distance_z
function linyangqi-tpanddistance:distance_z+ if @e[c=1,r=1024,tag=distance_mover]
function linyangqi-tpanddistance:distance_z- if @e[c=1,r=1024,tag=distance_mover]
//distance穷举格式{
/*
for 1 to 9
#a=2^(9-#i)-1
#b=2^(9-#i)
print:execute @s ~#b ~-512 ~-512 scoreboard players add @e[dx=#a,dy=1023,dz=1023,tag=distance_mover] distance_x #b
print:execute @s ~#b ~-512 ~-512 tp @e[dx=#a,dy=1023,dz=1023,tag=distance_mover] ~-#b ~ ~

for 1 to 9
#a=2^(9-#i)-1
#b=2^(9-#i)
print:execute @s ~-512 ~#b ~-512 scoreboard players add @e[dy=#a,dx=1023,dz=1023,tag=distance_mover] distance_y #b
print:execute @s ~-512 ~#b ~-512 tp @e[dy=#a,dx=1023,dz=1023,tag=distance_mover] ~ ~-#b ~

for 1 to 9
#a=2^(9-#i)-1
#b=2^(9-#i)
print:execute @s ~-512 ~-512 ~#b scoreboard players add @e[dz=#a,dx=1023,dy=1023,tag=distance_mover] distance_z #b
print:execute @s ~-512 ~-512 ~#b tp @e[dz=#a,dx=1023,dy=1023,tag=distance_mover] ~ ~ ~-#b
*/
//}
